message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand you're looking to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $775000?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $795000, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand your concerns about making a profit, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to consider $780000?
